scripts.browserify: for file in {app,element,lib}; do browserify src/$file.js -t babelify --outfile dist/js/$file.js; done
scripts.build: npm run write-versions && npm run less && npm run browserify
scripts.build-production: npm run write-versions && npm run less && npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.uglify: for file in {app,element,lib}; do uglifyjs dist/js/$file.js -o dist/js/$file.js; done
scripts.update-gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && git merge --no-ff -X theirs master && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout master
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm version patch && npm run build-production && git commit -a -m 'Build dist/' && git push origin master --tags && npm run update-gh-pages
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm version minor && npm run build-production && git commit -a -m 'Build dist/' && git push origin master --tags && npm run update-gh-pages
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm version major && npm run build-production && git commit -a -m 'Build dist/' && git push origin master --tags && npm run update-gh-pages
scripts.write-versions: npm ls rx | tr -d ' ' | sed -ne 's/.*rx@\(.*\)\s*/export default "\1"/p' > src/rx-version.js && echo "export default $(npm version)['rxmarbles']" > src/version.js
